testimonials.title: Trusted by Professional Contractors
testimonials.description: Real feedback from experienced installers, renovation contractors, and building material professionals who rely on Painto SUPER products daily.

testimonial1.text: The instant adhesive saves us hours on every cladding project. Since we switched to SUPER – no complaints.
testimonial1.author: Yossi Levy

testimonial2.text: 15 years in construction – and this is the strongest adhesive I’ve worked with. Holds up in any weather.
testimonial2.author: Cohen

testimonial3.text: The work team increased productivity by 30%. SUPER has become our default.
testimonial3.author: David Shlomo
